module.name: Mahara
module.description: Mahara is an open source e-portfolio, weblog, resume builder and social networking system, connecting users and creating online learner communities. Mahara is designed to provide users with the tools to demonstrate their life-long learning, skills and development over time to selected audiences.

release.notes: This module requires Mahara to be installed first on the same server as ATutor. Refer to the README file included with the Mahara module source code for more details.
